survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of professional networking events to improve future event planning and attendee experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse attendee preferences.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make at the event?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear ranges to standardize responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make at the event?

questions.question_text: What could be improved for future networking events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide qualitative insights for improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What could be improved for future networking events?

questions.question_text: Would you attend a similar event in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to gauge likelihood of future attendance.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you attend a similar event in the future?
